name: Space Way - Save the Earth
description:
Save the BLUE PLANET (THE EARTH)! You must save the Earth! Else sky stones destroy The Blue Planet. You love this planet. Because you born in here. You grew up in here. Has your loved ones in here. Save this Blue Point! All sky stones coming to Earth. 

+Why? 

- We don't know too. Either aliens send this sky stones either God anger or others.  We don't know. You can destroy sky stones with your rocket. You can help us with this method! If you would help us you become The Earth Hero!
